mapper.select: SELECT w.*, e.handleresult,e.handlername , e.handlermark FROM ich_ext_witnesses w LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM ich_ext_examine WHERE source = #{source}) e ON w.id = e.sourceid WHERE 1 = 1 AND w.status = #{status} AND w.wid = #{wid} AND w.wname like '%${wname}%' ORDER BY w.status ,w.wid ASC
